expo.name: TrailRun
expo.description: GPS tracking app for trail runners with photo capture and route analysis

infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: TrailRun tracks your running routes and records GPS data during trail runs. Location access is essential for route recording and photo geotagging.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: TrailRun needs location access to track your running routes and record GPS data during your trail runs.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: TrailRun needs background location access to continue tracking your route even when the app is not in the foreground. This ensures your complete route is recorded during long trail runs.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: TrailRun captures photos during your trail runs and automatically geotags them with your current location to create memorable activity records.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: TrailRun accesses your photo library to save captured trail photos and create activity summaries with your images.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: TrailRun saves photos you capture during trail runs to your photo library for easy access and sharing.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: TrailRun uses motion data to improve GPS accuracy and detect when you pause during runs.
